title.bibl: Chicago Daily News, Aug. 21, 1935. in the Scrapbook of Mr. A. A. Pantelis, 221 N. La Salle St., Chicago, Ill Our Greek-Americans.

div.bibl: Chicago Daily, News, Aug. 21, 1935. in the Scrapbook, of Mr. A.A.Pantelis, 221 N. La Salle St., Chicago, IllOUR GREEK-AMERICANS.

body.p: On behalf of Achilles Catsonis, supreme president of the Order, the executive committee, and our 53,000 members, I wish to inform you that your extremely kind words mean much to the Greek-Americans, not only of this city, but through-out the United States. We have already made plans to reproduce this editorial so that every one of our members may become acquainted with it.
With fullest thanks for your splendid gesture to the Greek-Americans of this country, I am
